buffs.description: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Orc by 10 points for each 5-star Siren, and 20 points for each 6-star Siren. It is applied even when Siren is in Time Shop and does not exceed 400 points. (The medal buff increases as much as the Tribe Friendliness for the Knightage Hero's tribe that you revive from.)
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
